title: Kissinger's Bob Hormats on Lack of European Leadership (Audio)
itunes:title: Kissinger's Bob Hormats on Lack of European Leadership (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Bob Hormats, Vice Chairman of Kissinger Associates, on a Brexit-linked slowdown, and impact on Europe and global markets.
